suggest.amasty/module-special-promo-mftf-3: Install module-special-promo-mftf-3 module to be able to run Special Promotions MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version.
suggest.amasty/module-mage-2.4.7-fix: Install this module if you have a problem with extension on Magento 2.4.7 version
suggest.amasty/module-graphql-application-server: Install this package for compatibility with GraphQL Application Server.
